description:
You enter the Quest Testing Chamber. A wise-looking NPC stands ready to give you test quests.

This room tests:
- Quest acceptance and tracking
- Objective types (talk, collect, defeat)
- Quest chains and prerequisites
- Reward distribution

dialogues.message: Greetings, adventurer! I have quests that need completing. Would you like to help?

responses.text: Tell me about the Test Quest
I'm here to complete a quest

dialogues.message:
The Test Quest chain will have you:
1. Collect a Test Item from Location Alpha
2. Defeat a goblin in the arena
3. Return here to complete the quest

Will you accept?
Have you completed the Test Quest objectives?
Excellent! Your quest has begun. Check your diary for objectives. First, go to Location Alpha through the Map Test Room.

Well done! You've completed the Test Quest!

Rewards:
- 100 Gold
- 50 XP
- Test Trophy item
Thank you for testing the quest system! Return anytime to test again.
